person.persName: Peter S. Anderson (Mason County farmer, trader, and large-scale slaveholder)

body.p: Residence: Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky. A Mason County native. Married Mary Patton. Obituary states that he was "among the wealthiest citizens and largest slaveholders in the county, but the greater part of his fortune was swept away by the war."
